name: Chromaticon
description:
Chromaticon is a challenging, fast-paced color matching game that will test your perception and reflexes. Enjoy this immensely fun and excitingly novel experience!

"Chromaticon is Rlyeh Industry's bold, innovative colour-matching puzzler." - Pocket Gamer

"Chromaticon by Rlyeh Industry is our favorite #BNA (Best New App) - great audio, addicting gameplay & it looks amazing! Visual Appeal - 9, Controls - 8.5, Gameplay - 9" - AppAttack

• Unique game mechanics that mixes frantic motion-based action with tactical elements.
• Evolving gameplay provides you with new thrills and challenges.
• Distinctive, refined visual style with day and night themes for optimal experience.
• Rewarding achievements system linked with upgrades that help you progress in the game.
• Original soundtrack that complements on-screen action and visuals.
• Leaderboards that enable you to compete with your friends or the entire world!

Gameplay description:

• Protect the Core from being hit by colorful orbs by intercepting them with the Shield.
• Rotate the Shield to match colors of incoming orbs.
• Use touch or tilt controls to suit your playing style.
• Use Core Impulse to repair the Shield or destroy orbs when you’re in peril.
• Correctly catch Charged Orbs to obtain power-ups and use them to your advantage.
• Beware of Viruses which cause distracting effects!
• Complete achievements to gain Upgrade Points that can be exchanged for Core Upgrades. Each achievement is rewarded!
• Try to beat each stage with perfect accuracy to obtain gold rating.
• Meet the ultimate challenge in the Infinity Stage!

Chromaticon natively supports iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus at full resolution.
